definition: a brief swim in water, begin with vigor
details:
noun
- a brief swim in water
= synonyms: dip
- a steep and rapid fall
verb
- begin with vigor
= synonyms: launch
- devote (oneself) fully to
= synonyms: steep, absorb, engross, immerse, engulf, soak up
- cause to be immersed
= example: cause to be immersed
= synonyms: immerse
- immerse briefly into a liquid so as to wet, coat, or saturate
= synonyms: dunk
- thrust or throw into
= synonyms: immerse
- dash violently or with great speed or impetuosity
= example: dash violently or with great speed or impetuosity
- drop steeply
= example: drop steeply
= synonyms: dive
- fall abruptly
= example: fall abruptly
= synonyms: dump
